transcript:
I think about that summer day
when I went on my first date
We danced in an empty parking lot
to a song I've since forgot
And the first time I held his hand
I thought this boy could be a man
We must have been watching a movie
(I think it was Toy Story 3)
As long as you remember me
and all the ways I used to be

A part of me will always be 18
And time keeps ticking on it's truce
she'll steal away our youth
But that's how I'll remember me and you
takeaways: Bài hát gợi nhớ về những kỷ niệm đẹp của mối tình đầu.
Thời gian trôi đi nhưng những ký ức vẫn còn sống mãi.
Tuổi trẻ là một phần quan trọng của cuộc đời mỗi người.
